  Sys.Date(),
  paste(

    sub("^-|-$", "", gsub("\\\\.+", "-", tolower(make.names(params[["title"]])))),
    sep = " - "
  ),
  params[["title"]],
  params[["author"]],
  params[["date"]],
  params[["date_short"]],
  params[["date_short"]],
  params[["date_short"]],
  params[["abstract"]],
  params[["biography"]],
  c("fr" = "français", "en" = "anglais")[[params[["language"]]]],
  params[["meetup_id"]],
